name: Lymarien Swarm
description: The Lymarien Swarm is a large fey creature characterized by its enchanting beauty, with fluttering wings and luminous eyes. It moves with agility and can occupy the space of other creatures.
memorable: Its Distracting Beauty ability can significantly hinder enemies' effectiveness, creating a unique control dynamic in combat.
goals: To support allies and control the battlefield while disorienting enemies.
relations: Often found with other fey creatures, it may collaborate with beasts due to its ability to communicate with them.
environment: Prefers enchanting forests or mystical glades where fey creatures thrive.
strengths: High Dexterity allows it to evade attacks, while the ability to inflict crowd control with spells and distracting abilities provides tactical advantages.
weaknesses: Poor physical strength limits its combat potential; cannot regain hit points while in combat.
attacks: Claws attack with a potential for high slashing damage, coupled with a unique Flight of the Fey ability to lift and drop foes.
most_powerful_ability: Distracting Beauty, which can incapacitate enemies and impose disadvantage on their attacks.
senses: Possesses a passive Perception of 14, indicating decent awareness.
skills: Has proficiency in Stealth and Perception, enhancing its ability to move unseen and observe surroundings.
additional_information: Can cast spells like dancing lights and minor illusion at will.
Has immunity to many conditions such as charmed and frightened.
Can effectively disrupt enemy attacks and perceptions.
Swarm ability provides mobility advantages on the battlefield.
Works well in groups to enhance coordination and effectiveness.
spellcasting: Innately can cast spells like hypnotic pattern and sleep, focusing on crowd control.
test_queries: charming fey that speaks to beasts
swarm that can lift opponents in combat
